parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical resource id associated with the Device

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient on whom the device is affixed

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date from the date-range in which the implanted record was last updated.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date from the date-range in which the implanted record was last updated.
